Emma Lee Pettway Campbell (1928 - 2002) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na-ejikọta ya na otu Gee's Bend nkè ndị na-ese akwa. A gụnyere ya na 2013 History Refused to Die exhibition na Metropolitan Museum of Art A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Metropolitan Museum of Art, nkè Souls Grown Deep Foundation nyéré ya.
